data.title: Visit Belgium, your next travel destination in Europe
data.meta_description: Welcome to Belgium! We're delighted that you have chosen us for your next holiday. Discover our surprising regions and let yourself be seduced by all Wallonia, Brussels & Flanders has to offer.  Select your destination and start your discovery. Have a great trip !
data.text:
Welcome to Belgium! We're delighted that you have chosen us for your next holiday.

Discover our surprising regions and let yourself be seduced by all Wallonia, Brussels & Flanders has to offer.
